titles.title: To amend the Central Valley Project Improvement Act to prohibit the restoration of certain flows in the San Joaquin River.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2284)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

bill.summary: 11/29/1994--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from making releases for the restoration of flows between Gravelly Ford and the Mendota Pool on the San Joaquin River as a measure to implement the Central Valley Project Improvement Act without a specific Act of Congress authorizing such releases. Repeals provisions of such Act directing the Secretary to develop a comprehensive plan to address fish, wildlife, and habitat concerns on the San Joaquin River.
